fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name(s) shown on return - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTaxPayerSSN
fields.title: Identifying number - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtMrkPlaceIdenify
fields.title: Enter Marketplace Identifier (if any)

options.label: Yes - Did you pay premiums during your tax year for employee health insurance coverage you provided through a Small Business Health Options Program Marketplace
No - Did you pay premiums during your tax year for employee health insurance coverage you provided through a Small Business Health Options Program Marketplace

fields.name: txtEin
fields.title: Enter the employer identification number (EIN) used to report employment taxes for individuals included on line 1 below if different from the identifying number listed above

options.label: Yes - Does a tax return you (or any predecessor) filed for a tax year beginning after 2013 and before 2020 include a Form 8941 with line A
No - Does a tax return you (or any predecessor) filed for a tax year beginning after 2013 and before 2020 include a Form 8941 with line A

fields.name: txtNoEmpTaxyr
fields.title: Enter the number of individuals you employed during the tax year who are considered  employees for purposes of this credit (total from Worksheet 1, column (a))

fields.name: txtEqEmp
fields.title: Enter the number of full-time equivalent employees (FTEs) you had for the tax year

fields.name: txtAvgAnnWages
fields.title: Average annual wages you paid for the tax year (from Worksheet 3, line 3). This amount must be a

fields.name: txtPremPd
fields.title: Premiums you paid during the tax year for employees included on line 1 for health insurance coverage under a qualifying arrangement (total from Worksheet 4, column (b))

fields.name: txtPremPotPd
fields.title: Premiums you would have entered on line 4 if the total premium for each employee equaled the average premium for the small group market in which the employee enrolls in health insurance coverage

fields.name: txtEligPremPd
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtMulPer
fields.title: Multiply line 6 by the applicable percentage

fields.name: txtSubWksh1Amt
fields.title: If line 2 is 10 or less, enter the amount from line 7. Otherwise, enter the amount from Worksheet 5, line 6

fields.name: txtSubWksh2Amt
fields.title: If line 3 is $27, 000 or less, enter the amount from line 8. Otherwise, enter the amount from Worksheet 6, line 7

fields.name: txtStTaxCdt
fields.title: Enter the total amount of any state premium subsidies paid and any state tax credits available to you for premiums included on line 4. See instructions

fields.name: txtSubAmt
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSmallerAmt
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPdPrem
fields.title: If line 12 is zero, skip lines 13 and 14 and go to line 15. Otherwise, enter the number of employees included on line 1 for whom you paid premiums during the tax year for health insurance coverage under a qualifying arrangement (total from Worksheet 4, column (a))

fields.name: txtFullTtimeEqEmp
fields.title: Enter the number of FTEs you would have entered on line 2 if you only included employees included on line 13 (from Worksheet 7, line 3)

fields.name: txtCdtFremp
fields.title: Credit for small employer health insurance premiums from partnerships, S corporations, cooperatives, estates, and trusts (see instructions)

fields.name: txtAddnAmt
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you
